artist: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Fabric variations using "Orange Malachite" warp of orange and yellow-orange threads. Orange & gold warp. Yellow, metallic green & drk. orange weft.  Plain weave variation.  Right selvedge. (orange, gold, yellow, metallic green)
title: Orange Malachite Warp Development and Sampling
